name: Bootlander Demo
description:
Bootlander ;

[TR]

Ailesiyle vapur seyehatinde olan dostumuz vapurdan düşer ve kendini canavarlarla dolu olan bir adada bulur. Adada gördüğü, yıllardır bu ada olan başka bir insan olan fredd ile dost olur. Bakalım karakterimiz bu zorlu macerada ailesine ulaşabilecekmi.

[ENG]

our friend, who goes on a ferry trip  with his family, falls off the ferry and finds himself on an island full of monsters. He bestfriends another person he sees on the island , Fredd,  who has been on the island for years. let's see if our character can reach his family in this challenging adventure.
